title: Beware, beware, my beauty fair
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Michael Rubbo, Peter Svatek and Jean Lafleur
brief_description: Shows an audience watching, on a school auditorium stage, the portrayal of the beauty and the beast adventure. Behind the scenes, another drama develops as a play within a play is enacted.
creator_credit_for_label: ONF | NFB, Michael Rubbo, Peter Svatek and Jean Lafleur
